title: Refactor MatrixNorm interval bounds proofs
description: Refactor Nfp/Sound/Bounds/MatrixNorm/Interval.lean to reduce proof churn and simplify interval bound lemmas.

comments.author: TheDarkchip
comments.text: Refactored foldl_pair helper for pair foldl projections in MatrixNorm interval bounds; adjusted proofs to use Prod.fst/Prod.snd. Fixed CoreSound cdot lint warnings encountered during build.
